# Featured Work

01

Watchlist

A web app for keeping track of Movies and TV Shows you would like to watch. Discover, find information, watch trailers, and find out where you can watch them, all in one app.

React Redux Node.js Express Firebase

02

Portfolio

My personal website where I display my past projects and blog about JS-related topics. Built using Astro and modern web technologies to be fast and future-proof.

Astro React TypeScript Tailwind MDX

# Blog

Understanding the useEffect Hook Mindset

The trick to understanding useEffect is to figure out what your side effect should be "synced" with, rather than "when" it is happening.

July 5, 2019

Creating CSS Grid Layouts the Easy Way

Learning CSS Grid may be a daunting task to many developers. We discuss the minimum you need to know before you become a Grid believer (Hint: named grid areas!)

June 28, 2019

Accessing, Typing, and Destructuring Props in Emotion

Dynamic component styling is an important benefit of using CSS-in-JS libraries. I go over patterns for using component props, destructuring them (or maybe not!), and giving them types using TypeScript.
